column5: Can anyone give me a lead on a bait store in Quebec that carries leeches? I am looking to either order some and have them shipped to our lodge, or pick them up on the way if I can find a store close to our route of travel. I will be going to Senneterre, Quebec via Ottawa and Maniwaki the second week of June. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
in maniwaki, on the left, about mid-town there is a texaco station, i think it is a texaco. anyway, right next door there is a subway sandwhich store. that "texaco" station has leaches.
Thanks. This is a great help.

Bruce: I know exactly where you mean. This is the subway station that is open all night, right. We always stop there late at night for a bite to eat. Do you remember if the Texaco station is open 24 hours?
Evetyone Yank who passes through Maniwaki must stop at that station. Up and back. I wonder where the guy who owns that place spends HIS winters?
i don't know if the texaco station is open 24 hrs. look up the algonquin hotel tele. no, ask for rock and he'll tell you.
The gas station (and the Subway shop) are open 24 hours. (Or, have been since we've been coming through)
